name: The Mad Prince
description:
Introduction

Once upon a time, a proud and greedy prince became so infatuated with power that he tried taking over the world...

In The Mad Prince you play as a power-hungry prince whose greatest wish is to conquer the entire world, and to spread fear amongst the citizens at the sound of his name.

This game was created in roughly a week for a school project. It is based on a danish fairy tale called "Den Onde Fyrste" written by H. C. Andersen.

Made By

Mads Overgård Heningsen(Twitter: @MOH1301)Esben Kran Christensen(Twitter: @EsbenKC)Oscar Bagger(Twitter: @OscarBagger)Tobias Gjerlufsen(Twitter: None)Bo Nyby (Twitter: @bo_nyby)
